fields.description:
Make access possible to the widget.json config in the widget controllers.

For the app config (config.json) we can access the global config using Alloy.CFG but for widgets there is no solution.

It will very useful to make generic widgets with just a few configuration lines to change in the widget.json
fields.summary: Access to widget config with Alloy
